attributes.action: consider the singer-songwriter Kate Bush for an OBE or similar award
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kate Bush has been a major figure of importance on the British popular music scene since 1978. 

As such, Ms. Bush represents a unique native talent who has made a significant global impact and projected a highly creative and positive image of British music to the world. 

Therefore, this petition requests the Government recommends to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II for the singer-songwriter Kate Bush to be considered for an OBE or similar formal award on the grounds of her significant, protracted and enduring contribution to the artistic and cultural life of our country.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
